# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0), and steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5) and transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

### Inserter system at position(x=39.5, y=-79.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) and burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Pipe system at position(x=107.5, y=-34.5)
Consists of pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5) and pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors due to lack of fuel
- Ensure that burner mining drills and burners have a sufficient fuel supply before operating.
- Check the status of entities to identify which ones are lacking fuel.

### Errors due to lack of ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have the necessary ingredients to operate.
- Check the status of entities to identify which ones are lacking ingredients.

### Errors due to disconnection
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to a power source.
- Check the status of entities to identify which ones are not connected.

### Errors due to empty or full output
- Ensure that pipe groups and belt groups are properly connected and have a clear path for items to flow.
- Check the status of entities to identify which ones have empty or full output.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
